channel.title: Project News on Aurelia | Live Brain Perfusion Tracking
channel.description: Recent content in Project News on Aurelia | Live Brain Perfusion Tracking

item.title: BIH DHA Phase 2 started
item.description: We have moved into our new Aurelia Project Office at the Digital Labs of BIH Innovation and are excited to continue our work on Aurelia in Phase 2 of the BIH DHA.

item.title: BIH DHA Demo Day
item.description: We are excited to share the results of Phase 1 of project Aurelia in the BIH Digital Health Accelerator. On 19 May 2021 at 6:30 pm we invite you to attend the Demo Day, learn more about project Aurelia and meet us in the interactive breakout Q&A sessions.
